sections.description: Hero section with large background image

sections.description: Featured content in multi-column widget layout

hero.structure: 1 row with 1 column containing image, heading, and paragraph(s)

variants.name: Hero (block)
variants.structure: Block has 1 row(s) - Row 1: 1 column(s) [image, heading, paragraph(s)]

cards.description: List of cards with or without images and links
cards.structure: Each card = 1 row with 2 columns [image | heading, paragraph(s)] OR 1 column [heading, paragraph(s)] for no-image variant

sectionStylingValidation.trigger: Section 1 has exactly 1 sequence that became a block (hero)

section1.backgroundAnalysis: Large background photo image with overlay
section1.layoutAnalysis: Full-width hero, edge-to-edge, no visible section padding
section1.reasoning: Background image is part of hero's design (hero's own background), not section container styling. Hero blocks typically have their own backgrounds.

sectionStylingValidation.otherSections: Section 2 has 4 sequences, so section-metadata is retained (styling applies to container holding multiple content blocks)
